divs: Sighting Detailsone night my brother & i were hanging out in my mom's driveway smoking a cigarette & talking about ufo's(the subject always seems to come up when we're outdoors & the night sky is clear)& we started scanning the sky. we only saw the usual airplanes & helicopters that we're so used to because we lived so close to the airport so i told my brother i was going to bed because i had to work the next day. he said he was going to stay out a bit longer & that he would come tell me if he saw something. about ten minutes later he comes in & tells me to go out & see some lights that were acting kind of funny, but i told him to make sure it was something good, so he comes back in about ten minutes later & says that i should really take a look. i put some shoes & a shirt on & went out to see what it was. we were out there looking around for a couple minutes when we see these two lights that resembled those of an airplane, but as we continued to watch(i keep saying "we" because after everything happened i drilled my bro about what he saw & it matched what i had seen)they seemed alittle odd. as they got closer we noticed they were'nt blinking or anything, so we kept watching. when the lights got close enough to where they were about an inch & a half apart, which is where an airplane would be visible to us being in that area so close to the airport, they instantly turned into one light directly in the middle. my brother & i were like " what the *%$@, did you see that?". well, the light just kept on coming & when it was about the size of a dime & almost directly over us it went out like someone hit a light switch. but we kept looking, then we saw what it really was. it was a silent, transparent ship flying over us! there was this weird sensation & this sort of hum, kinda of like power lines make but it was more like a feeling than sound. scared the crap out of us because it was so low that i felt i could have hit it if i would have chucked a rock at it, & it was flying at about the speed of a blimp, not to mention that we had never seen anything like it except in the movies. while it was flying over us we could see an outline of the ship but we could also see the stars right through it! man, if there was only a machine that could playback memories! it was the shape of a bullet but flat on the bottom & tall, no wings. it had two fins on the top rear section & like this jet booster type thing in the back, which like i said, made no noise & didn't emit any light. it was weird man, i could see the outline of one of the fins through the other & the stars through it all! as it flew over us we both kind of shrinked back as if it would see us if we did't. it continued over us going from north to south & as it started to pass my moms house it turned back to one light, then alittle further it turned back into two lights like it had began. after that it dipped down towards the horizon so we couldn't see over my moms house anymore & we were already across the street. so as we start walking back across the street, we see it zooming towards the airport which is east of us, then instantly it starts zooming west faster than i have ever seen anything fly before. after that we didn't see it anymore, but we stood up for about two hours talking & looking. like i said before, afterwards i drilled my brother & we both saw the same thing. my heart was pounding through the whole experience. i've had other sightings as well, but that was one of the longest & closest ever. hope this info helps in any way possible. i am also after the truth.
Summary: one night my younger brother & i saw something in the sky that neither one of us will ever forget!
